entry.title: Get AccessToken From Tidal
entry.content:
AccessToken is a key to get the track\video streamurl.

  • AccessToken from Tidal Desktop: Support MQA Flac, canâ€™t download 360\Dobly
  • AccessToken from Tidal Android: Support all
  • AccessToken from Tidal IOS: Canâ€™t download Flac

How to use AccessToken.

  • For tidal-dl: Open tidal-dl and Enter 10 to set AccessToken
  • For tidal-gui: Open file tidal-ini and add a key â€œaccesstoken=xxxxxxxxxâ€ (xxxxxxx is your AccessToken)

Get AccessToken from Tidal Android

  1. Login Tidal Android and play a track

  2. With any file explorer, go to /sdcard/Android/data/com.aspiro.tidal/cache/okhttp

  3. Open a file in the folder and Find the â€˜Authorization: Bearerâ€™ very_long_key (At the beginning of the file)
    very_long_key is what you need to copy/paste, if the file not contain the â€˜Authorization: Bearerâ€™, open another file.

Get AccessToken from Tidal Desktop

Download Software

  • Tidal Desktop
  • Charles : View all of the HTTP and SSL / HTTPS traffic between their machine and the Internet

Install Charles

  1. Install Charles Root Certificate
    Select menu: Help â€“> SSL Proxying â€“> Install Charles Root Certificate

  2. SSL Proxying Settings

    Select menu: Proxyâ€“>SSL Proxying Settings

    Open SSL Proxying page and follow picture settings

  3. Open Options

    • Windows Proxy
    • Start Recording
    • Start SSL Proxying

  4. External Proxy Settings (If you need VPN to use Tidal Desktop)

    Select menu: Proxyâ€“>Proxying Settings

    Open Proxies page \ Windows page and follow picture settings

    Select menu: Proxyâ€“>External Proxying Settings

    Follow picture settings (IP and Port come from your VPN)

Get AccessToken

  1. Install Charles and Open it

  2. Open Tidal Desktop

    Charles will view all of the HTTP / HTTPS traffic between tidal and the Internet.

  3. Relogin on the Tidal Desktop and play a track

  4. â€˜Ctrl + Fâ€™ on the Charles

    • Enter â€˜authorization: Bearerâ€™ or â€˜authorizationâ€™ and click Find-Button

    • Select url contains â€˜tidalâ€™

    • Double click the selection

    • Select Contents page copy the authorization (remove â€˜Bearer â€˜)

Q&A

  1. Follow documentation but I canâ€™t get the AccessTokenâ€™
    Google how to use Charles.
  2. How to get AccessToken from Tidal IOS
    Google Charles IOS.

entry.title: Tidal-Media-Downloader Installation Documentation
entry.content:
Tidal-Media-Downloader is an application that lets you download videosã€tracksã€playlistã€album and artistâ€™s album from Tidal Website

Have two versionï¼š

  • Tidal-dl: cliï¼Œsupport windows\linux\macos\android
  • Tidal-gui: guiï¼Œsupport windows

ğŸ‰Tidal-dl

Install

Select the installation steps according to the computer system

  • Windowsï¼štidal-dl.exe

  • Linux: pip3 install tidal-dl --upgrade

  • MacOs:

  • Android:

    a). Install termuxï¼šhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.termux
    b). Open permissionï¼štermux-setup-storage
    c). Install pythonå’Œtidal-dl

Use

  1. Enter username and password.

  2. Type â€˜2â€™ and enterï¼Œset config file

    NameFunction
    Download pathFile save directory
    Audio qualityTrack quality
    Video qualitySupport 1080\720\480\360\240
    Add hyphensâ€˜-â€˜ between number and title, likeâ€˜01-Yellow.m4aâ€™
    Convert mp4 to m4aConvert mp4 to m4a(Only track)
    Add yearbefore or after the name of album directory
    Add explicit taglikeâ€˜01-Yellow-explicit.m4aâ€™
    Include singlesdownload artist EP&Single
    Save coversCover-Files are saved in the album directory
    Artist name before track-titleAdd artist name before the track-file-name
    ID before album-folderlike â€˜[20495848] Wretched and Divineâ€™

    Audio quailty: Master > HiFi > High > Normal

    Audio QualityFormat
    Normalmp4 or m4a
    Highmp4 or m4a
    HiFimp4 or m4a or flac
    Master(BEST)flac

  3. Type track\video\album\playlist\artist url to download

ğŸ•Tidal-gui

Because the gui more cumbersome to do, it is generally tidal-dl that adds new features first, and then gui follows up. Therefore it is recommended to use tidal-dl.

  1. Download Tidal-gui

  2. Open tidal-gui and set https-proxy and login

  3. Type track\video\album\playlist\artist url to download

ğŸ’Disclaimer

  • Music is not free, need a HIFI account.
  • Private use only.
  • Any secondary development of this tool has nothing to do with me.
  • You should not use this method to distribute or pirate music.
  • It may be illegal to use this in your country, so be informed.

âš½Q&A

  1. Does the tool require hi-fi account?
    Yes.
  2. Canâ€™t download â€˜Masterâ€™?
    Make sure the track or album you want to save has the â€œMâ€ logo beside of it.
  3. Need gui for MacOs.
    Need some times to learn swift.
  4. Requested quality is not allowed in userâ€™s subscription?
    You need a hi-fi account.
